package.shortDescription: A View represents an HTML page. It is based on a template, and contains the content to be filled in a template. You should have one view per HTML page in your application, while you should have only one template, used by all the views. Warning! The 1.1 version puts the View class in the html\template\view namespace. Therefore, it can only by used with PHP 5.3+ (note: the View class colided with the View class from the Drupal Views module)
